source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a cityscape scenery shot where the focus is on the architectural grandeur and atmosphere of a Venetian setting rather than a specific object or individual. The video showcases a magnificent, domed basilica constructed from light-colored stone, heavily adorned with statues and intricate carvings, featuring a wide staircase leading up to a large, dark green central door. To its right, a simpler building with a red-tiled roof is visible. In the foreground, dark gondolas are moored in the calm water at the foot of the stairs, while small figures of people on the steps and in the vicinity highlight the monumental scale of the main structure under an overcast sky. The camera's slight movement reinforces the environmental focus, capturing the overall splendor and context of the scene.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
In the foreground, a canal is visible. 
The dome is a slightly darker gray than the rest of the building. 
The camera begins looking up at the dome and sky before tilting down to a level angle, revealing the canal and gondolas.
The camera is moving to the left, suggesting it is traveling down the canal.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: In the foreground, a canal is prominently visible. The dome of the basilica is a slightly darker gray compared to the rest of the building. Initially, the camera is angled upwards, focusing on the dome and sky, before tilting down to a level angle, which reveals the canal and gondolas. The camera then moves to the left, implying that it is traveling along the canal.

source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video captures the architectural grandeur and atmosphere of a Venetian setting, focusing on a magnificent, domed basilica constructed from light-colored stone, adorned with statues and intricate carvings. The dome is a slightly darker gray compared to the rest of the building. A wide staircase leads up to a large, dark green central door, with a simpler building featuring a red-tiled roof visible to the right. In the foreground, a canal is visible, with dark gondolas moored in the calm water at the foot of the stairs. Small figures of people on the steps and in the vicinity highlight the monumental scale of the main structure under an overcast sky. Initially, the camera is angled upwards, focusing on the dome and sky, before tilting down to a level angle to reveal the canal and gondolas. The camera slowly moves to the left, suggesting it is traveling along the canal, reinforcing the environmental focus and capturing the overall splendor and context of the scene.

revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures the architectural grandeur and atmospheric charm of a Venetian cityscape. The focus is on a magnificent, domed basilica made of light-colored stone, adorned with statues and intricate carvings, and featuring a wide staircase leading to a large, dark green central door. The dome is a slightly darker gray than the rest of the building. To the right, a simpler building with a red-tiled roof is visible. In the foreground, a canal is visible with dark gondolas moored in the calm water at the foot of the stairs. Small figures of people on the steps and nearby emphasize the monumental scale of the basilica under an overcast sky. Initially, the camera is angled upwards, focusing on the dome and sky, before tilting down to reveal the canal and gondolas. The camera slowly moves to the right, suggesting it is traveling along the canal, enhancing the environmental focus and capturing the overall splendor and context of the scene.
